content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs?
Get cheap meds and loans now!!! Click this link!!! http://spam.fake/deal

It appears this message is not related to our home services. We are marking this number as spam and will not respond further. If you have any legitimate service needs, please contact us through official channels.
